name: notification-center-kit
description: A production-ready, self-hosted Notification Center system.
author: Antigravity

scripts.setup: cd backend && python -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload --port 8000
scripts.test: cd backend && pytest && cd ../frontend && npm test
